external_games.name: Rite of Passage: Heart of the Storm - Collector's Edition

name: Rite of Passage: Heart of the Storm - Collector's Edition
summary:
From Mad Head, the studio that brought you Subject 360 and the Nevertales series, comes another exciting story in the Rite of Passage saga.

Your mentor calls you, in need of urgent help. On your way to meet him, the sky turns supernaturally frightening! You’ll soon discover that your beloved professor is dealing with a dangerous storm unlike anything he’s ever witnessed. Can you uncover the dark secret swirling at the heart of this storm, or will lightning strike you down? Find out in this innovative hidden-object puzzle adventure game with tons of clever puzzles!

Return to Ashen Rise in the bonus game for a new adventure!
Test your skills with timed hidden-object puzzles!
Earn achievements and find collectibles.
Get help from the strategy guide.
Unlock concept art and more bonus goodies!
